name: AKE
description:
AKE is a Cyberpunk, Shmup made for the GMTK GameJam 2017.

Made in 48 hours

Your Life Is your ammo, but it's also depleting as you ride, collect the green orbs to replenish you life/ammo and see how High a score you can get!

Windows 64bit

Made in Unity, Using Maya, Substance, and Photoshop

Art  by Shakur Muller

Design and Code by Morgan Davies
